title: Facebook Earnings Overpower Critics for Now
text:
After defending his company at just about every venue imaginable over the past few months, it is a wonder that Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg still has a voice. But while his platforms continue to command a growing audience, it remains to be seen whether investors will remain enraptured.

The company reported strong third-quarter results on Wednesday, demonstrating that users are still flocking to Facebook’s apps with 2.8 billion people now using one of its services monthly. Impressively, in the quarter Facebook said...
description: The social-media company delivered another strong quarter, but the stock’s boost may not last.
